description.value: When you drink this potion, you gain a Climb Speed|XPHB equal to your Speed|XPHB for 1 hour. During this time, you have Advantage|XPHB on Strength (Athletics|XPHB) checks to climb. This potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

_srdData.name: Potion of Climbing

This potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.
